00018 #ifndef __CDYNAMICEXPRESSION_H
00019 #define __CDYNAMICEXPRESSION_H

00021 #include "cexpression.h"
00022 #include "cstringpool.h"

00024 NAMESPACE_BEGIN
00025 
00026 class cXMLElement;
00027 class cPar;
00028 class cMathFunction;
00029 class cNEDFunction;
00030 
00039 class SIM_API cDynamicExpression : public cExpression
00040 {
00041   public:
00052     enum OpType {
00053         ADD, SUB, MUL, DIV, MOD, POW, NEG,
00054         EQ, NE, GT, GE, LT, LE, IIF, AND, OR, XOR, NOT,
00055         BIN_AND, BIN_OR, BIN_XOR, BIN_NOT, LSHIFT, RSHIFT
00056     };
00057 
00058     class Functor; // forward decl
00059 
00063     class SIM_API Elem
00064     {
00065       friend class cDynamicExpression;
00066       private:
00067         // Types:
00068         //  - bool
00069         //  - double (there is no long -- we calculate everything in double)
00070         //  - string
00071         //  - pointer to an "external" cXMLElement
00072         //  - cMathFunction: function with 0/1/2/3/4 double arguments
00073         //  - cNEDFunction: function taking/returning Value (NEDFunction)
00074         //  - functor
00075         //  - math operator (+-*/%^...)
00076         //  - constant subexpression
00077         //
00078         enum Type {UNDEF, BOOL, DBL, STR, XML, MATHFUNC, NEDFUNC, FUNCTOR, OP, CONSTSUBEXPR} type;
00079         static cStringPool stringPool;
00080         union {
00081             bool b;
00082             struct {double d; const char *unit;} d;
00083             const char *s; // points into stringPool
00084             cXMLElement *x;
00085             cMathFunction *f;
00086             struct {cNEDFunction *f; int argc;} nf;
00087             Functor *fu;
00088             OpType op;
00089             cExpression *constExpr;
00090         };
00091 
00092       private:
00093         void deleteOld();
00094 
00095       public:
00096         Elem()  {type=UNDEF;}
00097         Elem(const Elem& other)  {type=UNDEF; operator=(other);}
00098         ~Elem();
00099 
00103         void operator=(const Elem& other);
00104 
00109         void operator=(bool _b)  {type=BOOL; b=_b;}
00110 
00115         void operator=(int _i)  {type=DBL; d.d=_i; d.unit=NULL;}
00116 
00121         void operator=(short _i)  {type=DBL; d.d=_i; d.unit=NULL;}
00122 
00127         void operator=(long _l)  {type=DBL; d.d=_l; d.unit=NULL;}
00128 
00133         void operator=(double _d)  {type=DBL; d.d=_d; d.unit=NULL;}
00134 
00139         void setUnit(const char *s)  {ASSERT(type==DBL); d.unit = stringPool.get(s);}
00140 
00145         void operator=(const char *_s)  {type=STR; s = stringPool.get(_s);}
00146 
00151         void operator=(cXMLElement *_x)  {type=XML; x=_x;}
00152 
00157         void operator=(cMathFunction *_f)  {type=MATHFUNC; ASSERT(_f); f=_f;}
00158 
00163         void set(cNEDFunction *f, int argc)  {type=NEDFUNC; ASSERT(f); nf.f=f; nf.argc=argc;}
00164 
00169         void operator=(Functor *f)  {type=FUNCTOR; ASSERT(f); fu=f;}
00170 
00174         void operator=(OpType _op)  {type=OP; op=_op;}
00175 
00179         void operator=(cExpression *_expr)  {type=CONSTSUBEXPR; constExpr=_expr;}
00180 
00184         int compare(const Elem& other) const;
00185     };
00186 
00197     struct SIM_API Value
00198     {
00199         // Note: char codes need to be present and be consistent with cNEDFunction::getArgTypes()
00200         enum {UNDEF=0, BOOL='B', DBL='D', STR='S', XML='X'} type;
00201         bool bl;
00202         double dbl;
00203         const char *dblunit; // stringpooled, may be NULL
00204         std::string s;
00205         cXMLElement *xml;
00206 
00207         Value()  {type=UNDEF;}
00208         Value(bool b)  {*this=b;}
00209         Value(long l)  {*this=l;}
00210         Value(double d)  {*this=d;}
00211         Value(double d, const char *unit)  {set(d,unit);}
00212         Value(const char *s)  {*this=s;}
00213         Value(const std::string& s)  {*this=s;}
00214         Value(cXMLElement *x)  {*this=x;}
00215         Value(const cPar& par) {*this=par;}
00216         void operator=(bool b)  {type=BOOL; bl=b;}
00217         void operator=(long l)  {type=DBL; dbl=l; dblunit=NULL;}
00218         void operator=(double d)  {type=DBL; dbl=d; dblunit=NULL;}
00219         void set(double d, const char *unit) {type=DBL; dbl=d; dblunit=unit;}
00220         void operator=(const char *s)  {type=STR; this->s=s?s:"";}
00221         void operator=(const std::string& s)  {type=STR; this->s=s;}
00222         void operator=(cXMLElement *x)  {type=XML; xml=x;}
00223         void operator=(const cPar& par);
00224         std::string str() const;
00225         Value& convertTo(const char *unit) {dbl=convertUnit(dbl, dblunit, unit); dblunit=unit; return *this;}
00226     };
00227 
00233     class SIM_API Functor : public cObject
00234     {
00235       public:
00236         virtual const char *getArgTypes() const = 0;
00237         virtual int getNumArgs() const {return strlen(getArgTypes());}
00238         virtual char getReturnType() const = 0;
00239         virtual Value evaluate(cComponent *context, Value args[], int numargs) = 0;
00240         virtual std::string str(std::string args[], int numargs) = 0;
00241     };
00242 
00243   protected:
00244     Elem *elems;
00245     int size;
00246 
00247   public:
00250 
00254     explicit cDynamicExpression();
00255 
00259     cDynamicExpression(const cDynamicExpression& other) {elems=NULL; operator=(other);}
00260 
00264     virtual ~cDynamicExpression();
00265 
00269     cDynamicExpression& operator=(const cDynamicExpression& other);
00271 
00274 
00278     virtual cDynamicExpression *dup() const  {return new cDynamicExpression(*this);}
00279 
00284     virtual std::string info() const;
00285 
00286     // Note: parsimPack()/parsimUnpack() de-inherited in cExpression.
00288 
00296     virtual void setExpression(Elem e[], int size);
00297 
00303     virtual Value evaluate(cComponent *context) const;
00304 
00309     virtual bool boolValue(cComponent *context);
00310 
00315     virtual long longValue(cComponent *context, const char *expectedUnit=NULL);
00316 
00321     virtual double doubleValue(cComponent *context, const char *expectedUnit=NULL);
00322 
00327     virtual std::string stringValue(cComponent *context);
00328 
00333     virtual cXMLElement *xmlValue(cComponent *context);
00335 
00341     virtual std::string str() const;
00342 
00346     virtual void parse(const char *text);
00347 
00351     virtual int compare(const cExpression *other) const;
00352 
00357     virtual bool isAConstant() const;
00358 
00362     virtual bool containsConstSubexpressions() const;
00363 
00368     virtual void evaluateConstSubexpressions(cComponent *context);
00369 
00374     static double convertUnit(double d, const char *unit, const char *targetUnit);
00375 
00377 };
